value.halfverse: praise the Name of the LORD.
value.verse:
Hallelujah!
Give praise, you servants of the LORD; *

value.halfverse: from this time forth for evermore.
value.verse: Let the Name of the LORD be blessed, *

value.halfverse: let the Name of the LORD be praised.
value.verse: From the rising of the sun to its going down *
The LORD is high above all nations, *
value.halfverse: and his glory above the heavens.
but stoops to behold the heavens and the earth?
value.verse: Who is like the LORD our God, who sits enthroned on high, *

value.halfverse: and lifts up the poor from the ashes.
value.verse: He takes up the weak out of the dust *

value.halfverse: with the princes of his people.
value.verse: He sets them with the princes, *

value.halfverse: to be a joyful mother of children.
value.verse: He makes the woman of a childless house *
